jobDescription: Experience in clinical data review and writing queries for clinical trials.Familiarity with INFORM, RAVE, J-review or other clinical databases or other data review tools (patient profiles, listings) would demonstrate the candidate's familiarity with the scope of work.Oncology or hematology experience preferred.Experience in excel required.Candidate should have direct experience working on clinical trials from a sponsor's perspective.Ability to understand clinical trial protocols.
